channel.title: [PI] Slayer!
channel.description: Here's the deal, whenever you do slayer you get the task and whatever, you teleport depending on your Task level, but whenever you kill what you're tasked, your task number doesn't go down and you don't get any xp or slayer points. Wtf? O.o

item.title: [PI] Slayer!
item.dc:creator: @ApocalypseX ApocalypseX
item.description:
@ApocalypseX wrote:

Here’s the only slayer thing I can find in PlayerSave.java 

characterfile.write("slayerTask = ", 0, 13);
characterfile.write(Integer.toString(p.slayerTask), 0, Integer.toString(p.slayerTask).length());

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Slayer!
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

Tell it to reset your task to a certain task number(hint look at your playersave.java)

also tell it to addskill xp to a certain player level.

Read full topic

Here’s the deal, whenever you do slayer you get the task and whatever, you teleport depending on your Task level, but whenever you kill what you’re tasked, your task number doesn’t go down and you don’t get any xp or slayer points. Wtf? O.o
